abilities.name: Healing Leaves
abilities.text: Once during your turn, you may heal 20 damage from your Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Healing Wrapping
attacks.text: Heal 100 damage from each of your Basic Pokémon.

attacks.name: X-Scissor
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 40 more damage.

attacks.name: Absorb
attacks.text: Heal 10 damage from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Energy Gift
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 3 Basic Energy cards and attach them to your Pokémon in any way you like. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Wondrous Cotton
attacks.text: Your opponent reveals their hand. This attack does 50 damage for each Trainer card you find there.

attacks.name: Push Down
attacks.text: Switch out your opponent's Active Pokémon to the Bench. (Your opponent chooses the new Active Pokémon.)

abilities.name: Stimulated Evolution
abilities.text: If you have Karrablast in play, this Pokémon can evolve during your first turn or the turn you play it.

attacks.name: Acid Spray
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Giga Drain
attacks.text: Heal from this Pokémon the same amount of damage you did to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Emerald Blade
attacks.text: During your next turn, this Pokémon can't use attacks.

abilities.name: Inferno Fandango
abilities.text: As often as you like during your turn, you may attach a Basic Fire Energy card from your hand to 1 of your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Collect
attacks.text: Draw a card.

attacks.name: Brighten and Burn
attacks.text: Look at the top card of your deck. You may discard that card.

attacks.name: Fire Blast
attacks.text: Discard an Energy from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Incendiary Pillar
attacks.text: If you have 10 or more Basic Fire Energy cards in your discard pile, this attack does 100 more damage.

attacks.name: Burn It All Up
attacks.text: Discard all Energy from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Licking Catch
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 3 in any combination of Fire Pokémon and Basic Fire Energy cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Blazing Burst
attacks.text: This attack does 50 more damage for each Prize card your opponent has taken. Discard an Energy from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Energized Shell
attacks.text: This attack does 30 damage for each Energy attached to this Pokémon.

abilities.name: Torrential Whirlpool
abilities.text: Once during your turn, you may switch your Active Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon. If you do, switch out your opponent's Active Pokémon to the Bench. (Your opponent chooses the new Active Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Energized Slash
attacks.text: This attack does 50 more damage for each Energy attached to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Bared Fangs
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon has no damage counters on it before this attack does damage, this attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Firefighting
attacks.text: Discard a Fire Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Air Slash
attacks.text: Discard an Energy from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Ice Edge
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage.

attacks.name: Ice Beam
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Double Freeze
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 90 damage for each heads. If either of them is heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Gale Thrust
attacks.text: If this Pokémon moved from your Bench to the Active Spot this turn, this attack does 90 more damage.

attacks.name: Sonic Edge
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by any effects on your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Electrobullet
attacks.text: This attack also does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Surprise Attack
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Discharge
attacks.text: Discard all Lightning Energy from this Pokémon. This attack does 50 damage for each card you discarded in this way.

attacks.name: Muddy Bolt
attacks.text: If this Pokémon has any Fighting Energy attached, this attack does 20 more damage.

attacks.name: Happy Return
attacks.text: Put 1 of your Benched Pokémon and all attached cards into your hand.

attacks.name: Reflect
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, this Pokémon takes 40 less damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Telekinesis
attacks.text: This attack does 70 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness or Resistance.

attacks.name: Focused Wish
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage.

attacks.name: Extended Damagriiigus
attacks.text: Move all damage counters from 1 of your Benched Pokémon to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.

attacks.name: Perplex
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Fortunate Eye
attacks.text: Look at the top 5 cards of your opponent's deck and put them back in any order.

abilities.name: Distorted Future
abilities.text: Once during your turn, if this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, you may have your opponent shuffle their hand into their deck and draw 3 cards.

attacks.name: Synchro Shot
attacks.text: If you have the same number of cards in your hand as your opponent, this attack does 90 more damage.

attacks.name: Oceanic Gloom
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, they can't play any Item cards from their hand.

abilities.name: Oceanic Curse
abilities.text: As long as this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, your opponent can't play any Item cards or Pokémon Tool cards from their hand.

attacks.name: Power Press
attacks.text: If this Pokémon has at least 2 extra Energy attached (in addition to this attack's cost), this attack does 80 more damage.

attacks.name: Harden
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks if that damage is 40 or less.

attacks.name: Smack Down
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon has Fighting Resistance, this attack does 50 more damage.

attacks.name: Vengeful Cannon
attacks.text: This attack does 20 damage for each damage counter on all of your Benched Fighting Pokémon.

attacks.name: Rising Chop
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon isn't a Pokémon ex, this attack does nothing. This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness or Resistance.

attacks.name: Acrobatics
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 30 more damage for each heads.

abilities.name: Ancient Wing
abilities.text: Once during your turn, if this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, you may devolve 1 of your opponent's evolved Pokémon by putting the highest Stage Evolution card on it into your opponent's hand.

attacks.name: Smash Uppercut
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Resistance.

attacks.name: Retaliate
attacks.text: If any of your Pokémon were Knocked Out by damage from an attack during your opponent's last turn, this attack does 80 more damage.

attacks.name: Invite Evil
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 3 Darkness Pokémon, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Knock Off
attacks.text: Discard a random card from your opponent's hand.

attacks.name: Ruffians Attack
attacks.text: Flip a coin for each Darkness Pokémon you have in play. This attack does 60 damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Gunk Shot
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Take Down
attacks.text: This Pokémon also does 10 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Mind Jack
attacks.text: This attack does 30 damage for each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Foul Play
attacks.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Active Pokémon's attacks and use it as this attack.

abilities.name: Look for Prey
abilities.text: Once during your turn, you may use this Ability. Your opponent reveals their hand, and you put a Basic Pokémon with 70 HP or less that you find there onto your opponent's Bench.

attacks.name: Body Slam
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Double Hit
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 40 damage for each heads.

abilities.name: Greedy Eater
abilities.text: If your opponent's Basic Pokémon is Knocked Out by damage from an attack used by this Pokémon, take 1 more Prize card.

attacks.name: Dark Bite
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, the Defending Pokémon can't retreat.

attacks.name: Power Whip
attacks.text: This attack does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon for each Energy attached to this Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Bite Together
attacks.text: If Durant is on your Bench, this attack does 20 more damage.

attacks.name: Shred
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by any effects on your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Ambush
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 60 more damage.

attacks.name: Procurement
attacks.text: Search your deck for an Item card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Focus Energy
attacks.text: During your next turn, this Pokémon's Hyper Fang attack's base damage is 240.

attacks.name: Hyper Fang
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Play Rough
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage.

attacks.name: Roar
attacks.text: Switch out your opponent's Active Pokémon to the Bench. (Your opponent chooses the new Active Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Odor Sleuth
attacks.text: Flip 3 coins. Put a number of cards up to the number of heads from your discard pile into your hand.

attacks.name: Special Fang
attacks.text: If this Pokémon has any Special Energy attached, this attack does 100 more damage.

abilities.name: Bouffer
abilities.text: This Pokémon takes 30 less damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Gold Breaker
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is a Pokémon ex, this attack does 100 more damage.

attacks.name: Wrapped in Wind
attacks.text: Attach a Basic Energy card from your hand to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Hurricane
attacks.text: Move a Basic Energy from this Pokémon to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

name: Antique Plume Fossil

abilities.name: Plume Protection
abilities.text: As long as this Pokémon is on your Bench, prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks from your opponent's Pokémon. Illustrated by AYUMI ODASHIMA

rules: Play this card as if it were a 60-HP Basic Colorless Pokémon. This card can't be affected by any Special Conditions and can't retreat.At any time during your turn, you may discard this card from play.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Brave Bangle
rules: If the Pokémon this card is attached to doesn't have a Rule Box, the attacks it uses do 30 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon ex (before applying Weakness and Resistance). (Pokémon ex, Pokémon V, etc. have Rule Boxes.)

name: Cheren
rules: You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Energy Retrieval
rules: Put up to 2 Basic Energy cards from your discard pile into your hand.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Harlequin
rules: Each player shuffles their hand into their deck. Then, flip a coin. If heads, you draw 5 cards, and your opponent draws 3 cards. If tails, you draw 3 cards, and your opponent draws 5 cards.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Hilda
rules: Search your deck for an Evolution Pokémon and an Energy card, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Tool Scrapper
rules: Choose up to 2 Pokémon Tool cards attached to Pokémon in play (yours or your opponent's) and discard them.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Ignition Energy
rules: If this card is attached to 1 of your Pokémon, discard it at the end of your turn.As long as this card is attached to a Pokémon, it provides Colorless Energy.If this card is attached to an Evolution Pokémon, it provides ColorlessColorlessColorless Energy instead.

attacks.name: V-Force
attacks.text: If you have 4 or fewer Benched Pokémon, this attack does nothing.
